text: Maylene and the Sons of Disaster are an American rock band. The band formed in 2004 in Birmingham, Alabama. The bend members at the moment are Dallas Taylor (lead singer), Brad Lehman (bassist, backing vocals), Kelly Scot Nun (guitarist), Chad Huff (guitarist), Matt Clark (drummer) and Jake Duncan (guitarist, backing vocals). ==References== Category:2000s American music groups Category:2010s American music groups Category:American heavy metal bands Category:Christian rock bands Category:Nu metal bands Category:Post- hardcore bands Category:Metalcore bands Category:Musical groups from Alabama Category:Entertainers from Birmingham, Alabama
title: Maylene and the Sons of Disaster
